title: Anyone else having major lag issues ?
body: Just got super laggy in a champ select , and dodge because of it? Just curious if I'm the only one I never have lag issues so ... just wondering ?

replies.body:
Without more detail on what kind of lag you were experiencing it's hard to say for sure what the cause is, but it sounds like you may be getting brief disconnections or packet loss. 

If this happens consistently, you may want to try going through the [Connection Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if it fixes it. If you still have problems after that, I'd submit a ticket so our Tech specialists can take a look at what's going on in more detail. Lemme know if this helps!
